bibl.title: Digging up Tell Jemmeh.
bibl.note: Smithsonian excavations at Tell Jemmeh (12 km south of Gaza). The granaries at Jemmeh belong to the late fourth to third centuries B.C., when all of Israel was under the control of Egypt's Ptolemaic Empire.
bibl.seg: van Beek Gus W., Digging up Tell Jemmeh.
Archaeology 36 (1983) pp. 12-19, 7 figg. coul., 2 plans, 1 carte.

Smithsonian excavations at Tell Jemmeh (12 km south of Gaza). The granaries at Jemmeh belong to the late fourth to third centuries B.C., when all of Israel was under the control of Egypt's Ptolemaic Empire.
